item.title: 伦敦市长在竞选活动中承诺新建 4 万套议会住宅
item.description: 伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）周一启动了竞选连任的活动，以争取第三个任期，他承诺在本十年结束前新建 4 万套议会住宅，作为解决该市住房短缺问题的努力的一部分。【原文：London Mayor Sadiq Khan, who launched his re-election campaign for a third term on Monday, pledged to build 40,000 new council homes by the end of the decade as part of efforts to address a housing shortage in the city.】

item.title: 大英百科全书》寻求 10 亿美元的首次公开募股估值
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大英百科全书公司（Encyclopaedia Britannica Inc.【原文：Encyclopaedia Britannica Inc., the education technology company and publisher of books including the Merriam-Webster dictionary, is seeking a valuation of about $1 billion its initial public offering, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 伊拉克称将削减石油出口以弥补产量缺口
item.description: 伊拉克表示，未来几个月将减少石油出口，以弥补今年早些时候产量超过欧佩克+限额的损失。【原文：Iraq said it will reduce oil exports in the coming months to compensate for producing above its OPEC+ limits earlier this year.】

item.title: 恒大许家印因虚报业绩被禁止进入中国市场
item.description: 中国证券监管机构对中国恒大集团前董事长兼创始人许家印的欺诈行为处以 4700 万元（650 万美元）的罚款。【原文：China’s securities regulator imposed a fine of 47 million yuan ($6.5 million) on China Evergrande Group’s former chairman and founder, Hui Ka Yan, after he was caught out in fraudulent behavior.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会起诉虚假人工智能声明的基金经理
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）处罚了两家基金管理公司，称其使用人工智能的说法是虚假的，从而加大了华尔街主要监管机构的打击力度。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission penalized two money managers for what it says were bogus claims about their use of artificial intelligence, stepping up a crackdown by Wall Street’s main regulator.】

item.title: 大石油公司确定了 CERAWeek 开幕日的议程
item.description:
今年的主题是能源转型，但第一天的重点将是化石燃料的主要生产国。【原文：

The theme this year is the energy transition, but the firm focus on day one will be the top producers of fossil fuels.

】

item.title: 能源成本反弹，加拿大工厂价格上涨 0.7
item.description: 在能源和石油的推动下，工业产品价格五个月来首次上涨。【原文：Prices of industrial products rose for the first time in five months, driven by energy and petroleum.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油挤压加剧，苏维埃航运公司承认困难重重
item.description: 俄罗斯国营油轮公司 PJSC Sovcomflot 表示，美国制裁给其运营带来了压力，这是美国制裁措施使俄罗斯石油运输复杂化的最新迹象。【原文：Russia’s state oil tanker company PJSC Sovcomflot said that US sanctions are putting pressure on its operations, the latest sign that the measures are complicating the delivery of the nation’s petroleum.】

item.title: 法航在巴黎夏季奥运会前增加飞往美国的航班
item.description: 今年夏天，法国航空公司将增加长途航班，以应对巴黎奥运会前日益增长的需求，尤其是来自美国的需求。【原文：Air France is adding long-haul flights this summer in response to growing demand, especially from the US, ahead of the Olympic Games in Paris.】

item.title: 壳牌计划剥离 1,000 个零售点转向电动汽车充电系统
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）计划在未来两年内每年剥离 500 个零售点，以满足日益增长的电动汽车充电器需求。【原文：Shell Plc plans to divest 500 retail sites annually over the next two years, responding to a growing demand for electric vehicle chargers.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行在投资银行业务方面瞄准主权财富基金
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）正在寻求扩大与主权财富基金和私募股权巨头的关系，同时扩大其在咨询和股权承销领域的业务范围。【原文：Barclays Plc is seeking to expand its relationships with sovereign wealth funds and private equity giants as it broadens its footprint in advisory and equity underwriting.】

item.title: 阿曼财富基金为物流公司首次公开募股征集标书
item.description: 阿曼投资管理局正计划对阿曼苏丹国的物流公司 Asyad 集团进行首次公开募股，因为这个海湾国家正在加紧实施资产剥离计划。【原文：The Oman Investment Authority is planning an initial public offering of Asyad Group, the sultanate’s logistics company, as the Gulf nation ramps up its divestment program.】

item.title: 纳斯达克交易所称盘前技术故障已解决
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc.【原文：Nasdaq Inc. said a technology glitch that disrupted premarket trading for almost three hours is now resolved.】

item.title: 肯尼亚股票回报率傲视全球，先令功不可没
item.description: 在不到三个月的时间里，肯尼亚的股票基准从谷底一跃成为全球表现最好的股票。【原文：In the space of less than three months, Kenya’s stock benchmark has swung from rock bottom to being the world’s best performer.】

item.title: 德国联邦金融管理局称，迟迟未涉足商业地产的银行可能面临最大痛苦
item.description: 2013年10月16日星期三，英国伦敦，德国金融业监管机构Bafin银行业监管主管雷蒙德-罗伊斯勒（Raimund Roeseler）在接受采访后合影。Roeseler说，Bafin尚未结束对银行涉嫌操纵银行间拆借利率的调查。摄影师：西蒙-道森【原文：Raimund Roeseler, head of banking supervision at Bafin, Germany's finance industry regulator, poses for a photograph following an interview in London, U.K., on Wednesday, Oct. 16, 2013. Roeseler said Bafin has yet to conclude its probe into banks' alleged rigging of interbank borrowing rates. Photographer: Simon Dawson】

item.title: Astera 提高首次公开募股规模和价格范围，人工智能股涨势汹涌
item.description: 英特尔公司支持的半导体连接公司Astera Labs Inc.将其计划中的首次公开募股规模提高了26%，因为投资者对人工智能的狂热正在升温。【原文：Astera Labs Inc., an Intel Corp.-backed semiconductor connectivity company, raised the size of its planned initial public offering by 26% as the investor frenzy around artificial intelligence plays picks up steam.】

item.title: 盖维卡尔警告：牛市将面临全球性流动性枯竭
item.description: Gavekal Research 认为，交易者应做好准备，迎接全球流动性的撤出，这将带来更大的市场波动。【原文：Traders should brace for a global withdrawal of liquidity, which will usher in more market volatility, according to Gavekal Research.】

item.title: 塔塔集团寻求从 TCS 股份销售中获得 11 亿美元，条款显示
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的交易条款，塔塔集团（Tata Sons Ltd. ）正在寻求出售该印度企业集团软件服务部门的股票，以筹集至少 11 亿美元的资金。【原文：Tata Sons Ltd. is seeking to raise at least $1.1 billion selling shares in the Indian conglomerate’s software services unit, according to terms of the deal obtained by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 空客和易捷航空寻求英国资助推动氢动力航空发展
item.description: 包括空中客车公司（Airbus SE）、易捷航空有限公司（EasyJet Plc）和罗尔斯-罗伊斯控股有限公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）在内的一个联盟呼吁英国政府提供更多资金，以便航空业在 2050 年前做好氢气准备。【原文：An alliance that includes Airbus SE, EasyJet Plc and Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc is calling for more funding from the UK government for the aviation industry to be hydrogen-ready by 2050.】

item.title: 美联储加息一改往日颓势，削减家庭净利息收入
item.description: 当美联储提高利率时，美国家庭的总利息收入通常会超过偿还债务的额外成本。但这次不是。【原文：When the Federal Reserve raises interest rates, US households — in aggregate — usually get a boost to interest income that outweighs the extra cost of servicing debt. Not this time.】

item.title: 家族办公室负责人看到更多秘鲁客户定居迈阿密
item.description: 布鲁诺-吉奥（Bruno Ghio）五年前创办的财富管理公司 Allie 只为秘鲁家庭服务。【原文：Bruno Ghio only works with Peruvian families at Allie, the wealth-management firm he founded five years ago.】

item.title: 英国对丹麦 "虚假 "税收计划交易商罚款 9900 万美元
item.description: 英国金融监管机构禁止一名交易员从事该行业的经营活动，并对其处以 600 万英镑（760 万美元）的罚款，原因是他涉嫌参与了一个从丹麦国库骗取数千万美元退款的 Cum-Ex 税收交易计划。【原文：The UK financial watchdog banned a trader from operating in the industry and fined him £6 million ($7.6 million) for his alleged role in a Cum-Ex tax trading scheme that obtained tens of millions of dollars of sham refunds from the Danish exchequer.】

item.title: 英国央行会议前英镑反弹押注升至 2007 年以来最高点
item.description: 投资者对英镑涨势的押注达到了17年来的最高水平，如果英国央行本周与其他银行一样发出降息信号，英镑将面临回落风险。【原文：Investor bets on pound gains are at the highest level for 17 years, leaving the currency at risk of a pullback if the Bank of England joins peers in signaling rate cuts this week.】

item.title: 花旗称买入 LPP，因其股价从兴登堡报告中反弹
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. 是看空波兰服装零售商 LPP SA 的经纪商之一）表示，激进做空者兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）煽动的急剧下跌创造了一个买入机会。【原文：Citigroup Inc., one of the more bearish brokers on Polish clothes retailer LPP SA, says the sharp drop stoked by activist short-seller Hindenburg Research has created a buying opportunity.】

item.title: 加拿大将加入由德国支持的创建氢能市场的努力
item.description: 加拿大将加入由德国和荷兰支持的启动氢气贸易的努力，氢气被视为一种清洁能源，可替代较脏的化石燃料。【原文：Canada is set to join a German- and Dutch-backed effort to kickstart the trade of hydrogen, which is seen as a clean-energy alternative to dirtier fossil fuels.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦将关键利率维持在创纪录水平，IMF会谈正在进行中
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行连续第六次会议将关键利率维持在创纪录的高位，因为新当选的政府正在与国际货币基金组织举行贷款谈判，该组织希望巴基斯坦采取紧缩的货币政策来抑制通货膨胀。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank held the key interest rate at a record high for a sixth straight meeting, as a newly-elected government holds loan talks with the International Monetary Fund that wants a tight monetary policy to curb inflation.】

item.title: 债务解决拖沓，加纳塞地将面临更艰难的时期
item.description: 加纳的塞地是非洲今年表现第三差的货币，最糟糕的情况可能还没有结束。【原文：The worst may not be over for Ghana’s cedi, Africa’s third-worst performing currency this year.】

item.title: 保加利亚寻求通过政府新任务避免更多动荡
item.description: 保加利亚总统给前总理博伊科-鲍里索夫（Boyko Borissov）的政党一周的时间来组建新政府，因为这个巴尔干国家面临着政治危机扩大的风险，这场危机损害了它加入欧元区和获得欧盟资金的努力。【原文：Bulgaria’s president gave former Prime Minister Boyko Borissov’s party a week to form a new government as the Balkan country risks extending a political crisis that’s hurt its efforts to join the euro area and gain access to European Union funds.】

item.title: 盈利预测跃升，新兴市场股票反弹绿灯闪烁
item.description: 推动新兴市场股票持续反弹的最后一块缺失，现在已经到位：盈利预期。【原文：The last piece that was missing to drive a sustained rally in emerging-market equities is now falling in place: earnings estimates.】

item.title: 阿联酋与德国签署 15 年天然气协议，促进能源安全
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国同意从 2028 年起向德国出售为期 15 年的液化天然气，这项交易进一步巩固了欧洲对化石燃料的使用，并巩固了这个中东国家成为主要供应国的计划。【原文：The United Arab Emirates agreed to sell liquefied natural gas to Germany for 15 years starting 2028, in a deal that further cements Europe’s fossil fuel use and underpins the Middle Eastern country’s plan to become a key supplier.】
